title: May 14, 2024 — Streamlit in Snowflake Release Notes | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Streamlit in Snowflake: Support for GCP — General Availability
With this release, we are pleased to announce the general availability of Streamlit in Snowflake on Google Cloud Platform (GCP), which was previously available as a preview feature.
For more information, see About Streamlit in Snowflake.
